meanings.definition: A woman who proposes toasts at a formal event.
meanings.sent1: At the elegant dinner, the toastmistresses raised their glasses to honor the guests.
meanings.sent2: The toastmistresses at the wedding reception made heartfelt toasts to the newlyweds.
meanings.sent3: The toastmistresses at the party had everyone laughing with their witty toasts.
meanings.sent4: She was the toastmistresses of the evening, her words lighting up the room.
meanings.sent5: The toastmistresses' words were like music, filling the room with joy.
